summary: This document is a Certificate of Existence issued by Osbert E. Potter, the Lieutenant Governor of the Virgin Islands, certifying that LSJE, LLC is duly organized under the laws of the United States Virgin Islands. It confirms the company's formation date and that it has paid all applicable fees.

persons.name: Osbert E. Potter
persons.context: Osbert E. Potter is the issuing authority of the Certificate of Existence for LSJE, LLC.

keyFacts: LSJE, LLC was formerly known as LSJ EMPLOYEES, LLC.
The company filed Articles of Organization on October 27, 2011.
The company is organized under the laws of the United States Virgin Islands.
The duration of the company is unlimited.
No Articles of Termination have been filed by the company.
